meanings.definition: The quality or state of being intense.
meanings.sent1: The intensenesses of the storm frightened the children.
meanings.sent2: The intensenesses of her gaze made him feel uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: The intensenesses of the movie kept everyone on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent4: The intensenesses of the competition could be felt in the air.
meanings.sent5: The intensenesses of the situation left them all breathless.

meanings.definition: The degree or amount of intensity.
meanings.sent1: She measured the intensenesses of the heat using a thermometer.
meanings.sent2: The intensenesses of his anger were evident in his raised voice.
meanings.sent3: The intensenesses of the flavor surprised her taste buds.
meanings.sent4: The intensenesses of the colors in the painting were striking.
meanings.sent5: The intensenesses of the music moved the audience to tears.

meanings.definition: The strong or extreme nature of something.
meanings.sent1: The intensenesses of the storm caused widespread damage.
meanings.sent2: The intensenesses of her passion for music was inspiring.
meanings.sent3: The intensenesses of the joke made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The intensenesses of the mountain's height took their breath away.
meanings.sent5: The intensenesses of the emotion in the room was palpable.
